attributes.additional_details:
Please amend the law for seriously  DISABLED  PEOPLE and the ELDERLY on pension credit.  So they   don't have to worry about transferring over to PIP.  Save them  the humiliating process of a  face to face interview.  We are a compassionate country, therefore let the process for DLA to PIP be automatic, so they do not have to be anxious.   JUST  let it be for the new comers.
Please sign  this petition for these people who must feel the despair and worry.
